Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Contaminated Water^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;污染水^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: I just can't figure out how to make the ^orange;contaminated water^reset; for some of my chemical stock. Can you help and make me some in a ^orange;centrifuge^reset;?
Texts.Chs: 我的化学用品采购单上还剩下^orange;污染水^reset;，但是我不知道经过什么步骤才能得到它，你能用^orange;离心机^reset;帮我做一点吗？

Texts.Eng: When you are able to, ^green;upgrade to an advanced centrifuge^reset; to really step up your lab game! Oh and be sure to keep your Contaminated water, you might need it.
Texts.Chs: 当你能够升级到^green;高级实验用离心机^reset;时才能真正地体现出你实验室的强大之处！噢，对了，请一定要储存一点污染水，你可能会需要到它。
